subject: Meeting Reminder: Project Status
message: Hi, just a reminder that we have a project status meeting at 10 AM tomorrow. Please prepare your updates.

subject: Weekend Trip Plan!
message: Hey! Are you in for the weekend trip to Shimla? Let me know so I can book tickets.

subject: Your Order #456321 Confirmed
message: Thank you for shopping with Amazon. Your order has been successfully placed and will be delivered soon.

subject: Design Assets for Review
message: Hi, please check the new design assets for the client presentation. Share your feedback before EOD.

subject: Welcome to I-Mail.in!
message: Hi there! We’re excited to have you onboard. Start exploring your new I-Mail inbox today.

subject: Job Application for Frontend Developer
message: Dear HR, please find attached my resume for the Frontend Developer position. Looking forward to your response.

subject: Top Tech News - October 2025
message: Here’s what’s trending in the world of startups, AI, and tech this week.

subject: Investment Portfolio Update
message: Hi, your quarterly investment performance report is attached. Let me know if you’d like a review meeting.

subject: Transaction Alert
message: A debit transaction of ₹3,200 has been made from your account ending 1234.

subject: Welcome to GPT Developer Preview
message: Congratulations! You now have access to the latest GPT APIs. Explore the documentation to get started.

subject: Collaboration Proposal
message: Hi John, I’d like to propose a collaboration on our new SaaS project. Please review the attached plan.

subject: Your Subscription Renewal
message: Your Spotify Premium plan has been renewed successfully for the next month.

subject: Invoice for Completed Work
message: Hey, I’ve sent over the invoice for last month’s freelance project. Please confirm receipt.

subject: New Pull Request Notification
message: A new pull request has been opened in your repository. Review and merge when ready.

subject: Your Zomato Order Delivered
message: Your order from Wow! Momo has been delivered. Rate your experience to help us improve.

subject: Outdated Offer - Please Ignore
message: This offer has expired and should no longer be used.

subject: TCS Interview Invitation
message: Congratulations! You have been shortlisted for the next round of interviews. Please confirm your availability.

subject: New Login Attempt Detected
message: We detected a new login attempt from a Chrome browser on Windows. Was this you?

subject: Top Reads This Week
message: Check out the most popular stories on Medium this week. Explore trending topics across AI, tech, and creativity.

subject: Storage Limit Warning
message: You’re nearing your 15GB inbox storage limit. Please delete unnecessary emails or upgrade your plan.
